website_summaries.verdict: An excellent primer by a trendy brand known for making quality cosmetics, and one that delivers notable results for most users.
pros: Despite the reasonable price, this lash primer has earned a loyal fan base for the excellent results it produces
cons: When the tube is new, a lot of product comes out on the brush
Goes on somewhat heavy, but applying it with a light hand helps

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product except that it seems to dry up ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product except that it seems to dry up really quickly & the brush is not the friendliest to use once the product starts to get dry.
customer_reviews.author: Jadine Smith

customer_reviews.title: ... have very light blonde lashes and they are very fine as well
customer_reviews.text: I have very light blonde lashes and they are very fine as well. This product gives me the allusion of beautiful long lashes without looking fake. Product goes on like a dream!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra B

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stuff...
customer_reviews.text: It's great for people like me who have pretty thin lashes. The mascara really grips to the lash primer and helps out. Using 2 coats of mascara doesn't do the same for me and oftentimes gets clumpy looking. So yes, it's a little on the pricey side, but the bottle lasts me quite a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Rackers

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara primer will comtinue to use
customer_reviews.text: I wear it almost every time I apply mascara work great thickens lengths and make my mascara stay put .
customer_reviews.author: VBowers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great prep for eye shadow. Best of all I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Evalu8er

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This actually works, it enhances the look of my lashes and it makes my cheap drugstore mascara last longer and without smudges. Now, I can only imagine the difference it would make with a good quality mascara
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Hernández

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Tarte plays the line between "natural" and "prestige" in cosmetics; this is the first product of theirs I've tried. In comparison to drugstore primers, it falls short; it creates clumpy, spidery spikes when applied thickly and doesnt seem to do too much when applied lightly. However, it has been a decent compliment to a natural mascara.I would not pay nearly $30 bucks again, though, when a second coat of mascara does the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Kate

customer_reviews.title: Longer, Thicker and Fuller Eye Lashes
customer_reviews.text: My lashes looks naturally long and thick (they are not without it) with this product. I've used it with different mascaras like covergirl to benefits bad girl mascaras and the results are always terrific. I get many compliments on my lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: I've never found anything like it - but the combo is key
customer_reviews.text: Combine this with NYX mascara and you will have lashes UNLIKE ANY OTHER. No clumps - just gorgeous long lashes that last all day and all night. I've never found anything like it - but the combo is key.
customer_reviews.author: Ali Perry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: goes on white but the color dissapears after a few minutes. looks conditioned and separates lashes
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A bit disappointed
customer_reviews.text: When firstly I recieved the trial version of this product and tried it on my lashes the results were awsome. So, I decided to purchase the original version of it. However, a big disappointment that I'm not getting the same results that I had before :-(
customer_reviews.author: Shatha

customer_reviews.title: Beauty you can feel good about!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product because it adds length and you don't have to worry about poisonous chemicals getting into your eyes! I love tarte! Beauty should not be poison ! Maybe pain lol! But not poision !
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: No, thank you.
customer_reviews.text: This product REALLY irritated my eyes, so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: 💕 Indiangirl 💕

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product, it is so great. Makes putting on mascara an ease. Buy this product it is so wonderful!!!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!!!
customer_reviews.text: It really does increase the volume of my lashes; I use it everyday (along with my Tarte mazonian Clay Mascara)and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette Miller

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this primer! I'd never used a lash primer before, and let me tell you, this primer makes a world of difference! It works with drugstore mascaras on top of it too! Provides crazy length and volume. This is an absolute must have! Please try it!
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this mascara primer. I have thin, wimpy lashes and this primer elongates and makes my lashes look thicker. It also seems to help mascara stay put and not have the "raccoon" eyes that I've had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: shawn arnold

product_meta.title: Tarte MultiplEYE Clinically-Proven Natural Lash Enhancing Primer MultiplEYE Clinically-Proven Natural Lash Enhancing Primer 0.32 oz
product_meta.description: An eyelash primer infused with high-performance natural ingredients to increase the appearance of lash volume and the look of lash length as it preps and primes your lashes Prep and prime lashes Shaped brush, separates and evenly coats every last lash Stimulate lashes from root to tip Full size 9.5ml/0.32oz New in box
feature_bullets: An eyelash primer infused with high-performance natural ingredients to increase the appearance of lash volume and the look of lash length as it preps and primes your lashes.
Prep and prime lashes. Shaped brush, separates and evenly coats every last lash. Stimulate lashes from root to tip.
